subject: Baseball
Monuments and Memorials (Structures)
Awards, Decorations and Honors
Baseball (College)
lead_paragraph: Like Jacob Lindgren and Slade Heathcott after him, Williams, the Yankee legend who had his number retired Sunday, earned his shot through happenstance.
snippet: Like Jacob Lindgren and Slade Heathcott after him, Williams, the Yankee legend who had his number retired Sunday, earned his shot through happenstance.
